CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Percent_Complete__c >0, Percent_Complete__c < 0.255 ), "1% - 25%", IF( AND( Percent_Complete__c >= 0.255, Percent_Complete__c < 0.505 ), "26% - 50%", IF( AND( Percent_Complete__c >= 0.505, Percent_Complete__c < 0.755 ), "51% - 75%", IF( AND( Percent_Complete__c >= 0.755, Percent_Complete__c < 1.0 ), "76% - 99%", IF( Percent_Complete__c >= 1.0, "Complete", NULL ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Completion Progress
